name: Icarus Dash
description: Dodge while airborne. Activate by double-tapping jump while in the air. Heat Rises grants an additional dodge charge.
usage: Use for quick aerial repositioning, dodging incoming fire, or extending airborne time during combat.

name: Lightning Surge
description: Activate your charged melee while sliding to transform into a ball of lightning that travels forward and jolts targets.
activation: Activate charged melee ability while sliding
usage: Slide into enemy groups to jolt multiple targets at once. Effective for crowd control and triggering Arc synergies.

name: Thruster
description: Dodge in your direction of movement while airborne or on ground. Breaking shields with this aspect equipped jolts nearby targets.
activation: Press Class Ability button while moving (ground or air)
usage: Quick lateral dodge for repositioning. Breaking enemy shields jolts nearby targets, triggering Arc effects.

name: Consecration
description: Slide then melee to launch into the air and slam down, creating a damaging wave of Solar energy that scorches targets.
usage: Combo for burst damage and scorch application. First slam launches you up, second slam crashes down dealing AoE damage.

name: Howl of the Storm
description: Slide then melee to create a wave of Stasis energy that freezes targets and creates Stasis crystals.
usage: Excellent for freezing groups of enemies and creating crystals for shattering. Great crowd control tool.

name: Flechette Storm
description: While sliding or immediately after a slide, activate your charged melee to launch a volley of damaging Strand projectiles.
activation: Press charged Melee button while sliding or just after
usage: Ranged damage option while sliding. Effective for hit-and-run tactics and applying Strand effects from distance.

name: Tempest Strike
description: Slide then melee to launch a wave of Arc energy forward that damages and jolts targets in its path.
usage: Ranged melee attack that jolts enemies. Great for engaging from mid-range and triggering Arc synergies.

name: Shatterdive
description: While airborne, quickly descend and shatter all frozen targets and Stasis crystals near the impact point.
usage: Aerial slam that shatters crystals and frozen enemies. Combine with grenades to freeze then shatter for massive damage.

name: Ensnaring Slam
description: While airborne, press the charged melee button to slam down and suspend all nearby targets on impact.
activation: Press charged Melee button while airborne
usage: Aerial crowd control ability. Suspends enemies in an area, leaving them vulnerable to follow-up attacks.
